thread.title: Proposed Customer Live Chat Feature Would Give CHGT Portal Distinct Edge
thread.title_full: Proposed Customer Live Chat Feature Would Give CHGT Portal Distinct Edge

title: Proposed Customer Live Chat Feature Would Give CHGT Portal Distinct Edge
text:
Proposed Customer Live Chat Feature Would Give CHGT Portal Distinct Edge October 08, 2015 05:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
HOUSTON--( BUSINESS WIRE )--Changing Technologies, Inc. (OTCBB:CHGT) continues to revolutionize how 3D content creators and printers collaborate with each other through its innovative online portal, 6d3d.com , that is building strong momentum throughout the global printing community. 
Now the company wants to add two defining features that would set it apart in the industry: a 3D printing customer-service phone line/online live chat system that would enable users to find quick solutions to their design or production problems. 
“The exciting features will help our portal stand above all others in the marketplace,” said CHGT CEO Marco Valenzuela. “When implemented, content creators and printers would quickly make 6d3d.com their preferred site of choice to find, network with and collaborate on 3D printing projects of all types, from the simple to the most complex. The portal has already exceeded our expectations, and we will keep up our pace in rolling out enhancements designed to keep it at the industry forefront.” 
6d3d.com ’s rapid rise mirrors the tremendous growth of 3D printing itself . Once limited to small prototypes, 3D printing has now expanded into actual manufacturing in a variety of industries from toys , to automotive to medical using numerous once-exotic materials . One recent survey revealed two-thirds of the Top 100 manufacturing companies are employing 3D printing . 
For more information on CHGT, please visit www.changingtechno.com . 
For more information on 6 th Dimension Technologies, visit http://www.6d3d.com . 
About Changing Technologies, Inc. 
Changing Technologies, Inc. (CHGT) is an emerging technology company focused on developing innovative concepts to bring to consumers. It recently created a new subsidiary — 6 th Dimension Technologies — to pursue additional growth areas and market needs in the booming 3D printing sector. A forward-thinking company working to be at the forefront of the next generation of consumer-based technology, CHGT is positioning itself to leverage global demand for the latest technological advances and services the company offers. Changing Technologies, Inc. is in the cutting-edge technology sphere alongside companies like Voxelijet AG ( VJET ), Arcam AB ( AMAVF ), and ExOne Co. ( XONE ).
